statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, timestamp, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 50;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price, (quantity * price) AS total_price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_id, timestamp, quantity FROM inventory_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_id, SUM(predicted_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM predictions GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, prediction_date, predicted_quantity FROM predictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_id, SUM(predicted_quantity) AS total_predicted_quantity FROM predictions GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM time_series_data
SELECT item_id, timestamp FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT id, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM time_series_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY item_id
SELECT * FROM time_series_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY item_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100
SELECT item_id, MAX(quantity) FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) FROM sales_data GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE item_id = 100 AND revenue > 100
SELECT * FROM retail_inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, quantity, timestamp FROM retail_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date, store_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM retail_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data INNER JOIN store_locations ON sales_data.store_id = store_locations.store_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT sale_date, profit FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT order_date, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, address FROM suppliers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT sales.id, product_id, quantity_sold, profit, sale_date, product_name, quantity FROM sales JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.id WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 10;
